title: Let's Go to the Circus!
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 250 words, Level G (Grade 1), Lexile 350L, Fiction Series
description: The Monsters can't wait to go to the circus, but none of them have money. Their lemonade and pizza stands go bust. But then a mischievous monkey escapes from the circus and dashes up a tree. Bonk's clever solution brings the monkey back to the circus, and the Ringmonster rewards the friends.
reviewWords: circus, crust, elephants, lemonade, sugar, thirsty
comprehension: Cause and Effect                : Identify cause-and-effect relationships
grammar: Interrogative Sentences                : Recognize and use interrogative sentences
wordWork: Alphabetizing                : Alphabetize words to the first letter
